resources.string:
About Exchange Rates app

Are you looking for :
- a lightweight and simple,
- user friendly
- and no Ads Myanmar Exchange Rates app?
Then, this one is for you. I used public API of Central Bank of Myanmar to retrieve exchange rates data. You can also able to use Currency Calculator.

Central Bank of Myanmar API
https://forex.cbm.gov.mm/index.php/api

Developed by Kaung Khant Kyaw using AIDE (Android IDE).
